title: Jordan Peterson Changing the Definitions of God (1 & 2) and Religion (s) and (w)
description:
In my last video I looked at Tom Holland's deconstruction from his Enlightenment faith. https://youtu.be/4O2t443uJ4I 

In preparation for that I re-watched this video a number of times. https://youtu.be/syP-OtdCIho

There are two definitions of religion in play here. Religion (s) which is the secular definition of "religion" where people pray, go to religious services, pursue a relationship with a divine being in order to influence events on the ground. This compared to religion (w) which is more worldview. It is the coding of the culture-net, or the symbolic-dramatic-liturgical-imaginary. 

The comment I read about real relations is pinned on this video. https://youtu.be/M6QmOWI2Ysw

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/
